thread.title: LAMPAOG/JANNEN

author: LAMPAOG/JANNEN
title: LAMPAOG/JANNEN
text:
One of my friend mention about this travel company so i search about it and immediately agent starts calling me giving me good options of plane tickets to my destination.
And this Althea agent is the most comfortable agent to talk to and maybe all of there agent.
She helps me all the way and now got my ticket and still keeping intouch with me making sure they answer all my question.
So I'll definately and will purchase my plane tickets with this company again. And would 100% recommend this company to anyone.
